overview: Comedian Big Jay Oakerson takes viewers on a tour of the craziest competitions that happen in the middle of the legendary Buffalo Chip in Sturgis, S.D. Whether it's a makeshift bikini competition, a tattoo challenge, a full-on motorcycle build, a burnout contest or a vertical motorcycle hill climb, Big Jay will leave no competition unturned at the rowdiest biker party in America.
title: CMT Bike Week: Biker Battles
